contentrichtext.text: '''[[Volleyball]] in [[Poland]]''' is a popular team sport. It's one of the most popular sports in Poland. The Men's national team is ranked 3rd and the Women's team is ranked 13th in the FIVB World Rankings. Both teams have a lot of success in international competitions. * [[Polish Volleyball League|Polish Volleyball League (PlusLiga)]] (PlusLiga Siatkarzy, formerly Polska Liga Siatkowki, PLS) * [[Polish Seria B Men's Volleyball League]] * [[Polish Women's-Volleyball League]] * [[Polish Seria B Women's Volleyball Leagaue]] * [[Polish Cup in men volleyball]] * [[Polish Cup in women volleyball]] * [[Poland men's national volleyball team]] * [[Poland women's national volleyball team]] ==See also== *[[Sports in Poland]] == External links == * [http://www.pls.pl Polska Liga Siatkówki] (Polish Volleyball League) Official site * [http://www.pzps.pl Polski Związek Piłki Siatkowej] (Polish Volleyball Union) Official site * [http://www.reprezentacja.net Polskie Reprezentacje Piłki Siatkowej] (Polish National Women's and Men’s Volleyball Team) * [http://www.e-volley.pl Wszystko o siatkówce w męskim wydaniu] (Everything About Men's Volleyball) {{Europe topic|Volleyball in}} [[Category:Volleyball in Poland| ]] {{Volleyball-stub}} {{poland-sport-stub}}
